Package it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DialogForMessage
    Creates a dialog to show a message or to invite the player to draw power up cards and choose which terminator action use.
    FrameForInitialization
    Handle the creation and update of the frame in the initial phase to store the information about connecting player
    KillshotTrackPanel
    Hanldes the creation and the update of the north panel in Border Layout of main frame where is located the killshot track.
    LeftPanel
    Hanldes the creation of the panel located in the left side of the border layout of main frame.
    ListenerButtonAction
    Listener for the buttons located in the panel of actions.
    ListenerDrawOkButton
    Listener for the button ("DRAW" or "OK") in the dialog for message
    ListenerForButtonOfTerminator
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choose of a particular action that terminator has to do.
    ListenerForButtonPB
    Listener for the buttons to choose to view a player board of a specific player.
    ListenerForButtonPlayers
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choose of a player in three different occasion.
    ListenerForButtonSelectionSquare
    Listener for the buttons that permits to return to the normal view on the map panel when the player has to select a square or to return the selection view.
    ListenerForCheckBoxPlayers
    Listener for the check box buttons concerning the choice of multiple players.
    ListenerForChooseEffect
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choose of an effect of a weapon.
    ListenerForChooseOfWeapon
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choice of a weapon in three different occasion.
    ListenerForColorButtons
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choice of the color of the figure in the initialization phase.
    ListenerForDiscardPowerUp
    Listener for the choice of power up cards in two different occasion.
    ListenerForMapButtons
    Listener of the buttons concerning the choice of the type of map in the initialization phase.
    ListenerForNextButton
    Listener for the next button in the frame of initialization.
    ListenerForPopupToPayWithAmmoOrPUCArd
    Listener for buttons concerning the choice of pay with ammo or power up cards.
    ListenerForPowerUpCard
    Listener for the power up cards stored in the deck and relative buttons to use them.
    ListenerForWeaponCard
    Listener for the weapon cards stored in the deck and relative buttons to use them.
    ListenerForYesNoButtons
    Listener for the buttons concerning the choice to have terminator and frenzy mode during the game.
    ListenerOfSquare
    Listener for the labels that represent the squares of the map.
    MainFrame
    Handles every aspect about GUI.
    MapPanel
    The central panel in the border layout of the main JFrame.
    PanelForWeapons
    Handles the creation of a panel that shows weapons.
    PanelOfActions
    Handles the creation of the panel of action located in the right side in the border layout of main JFrame.
    PanelOfPlayers
    Creates the panel of players in the right panel of main JFrame where a player can choose another player and see his player board.
    PlayerBoardPanel
    Handles the creation of the player board panel to add it on the left panel.
    PopupForChooseEffect
    Handles the creation of the dialog to let the player choose an effect of the weapon already chosen.
    PopupForChooseWeaponCard
    Handles the creation of the dialog to choose a weapon card.
    PopupForDamageMarks
    Handles the creation of the dialogs for damage and marks located on the player board panel
    PopupForDiscardPowerUp
    Handles the creation of the dialog to discard a power up card.
    PopupForKillshotTrack
    Handles the creation of the dialog that show tokens of death on the killshot track.
    PopupForNormalSquare
    Handles the creation of the dialog to show who and what is on a normal square.
    PopupForPowerUpCard
    Handles the creation of the dialog that show information about a power up card.
    PopupForSpawnSquare  
    PopupForSquare
    Class inheritable by PopupForNormalSquare and PopupForSpawnSquare containing the method to add players to panel of players in the dialogs.
    PopupForWeaponCard
    Handles the creation of a dialog that show information about a weapon card.
    PopupToChooseAPlayer
    Handles the creation of a dialog useful to let the player choose another player.
    PopupToChooseMultiplePlayers
    Handles the creation of a dialog to let the player choose multiple players.
    PopupToPayWithAmmoOrPowerUpCard
    Handles the creation of a dialog to let player to choose what with pay.
    RightPanel
    Handles the creation of the panel that is added on the right side in the border layout of the main JFrame.
